titleStmt.title: William McCow v. Territory of Washington. Order Granting Writ

bibl.title: William McCow v. Territory of Washington. Order Granting Writ.
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: Territory of Washington County of Walla Walla | ss.
In the District Court 1st Judicial District The United States of America
To George J. Thomas Sheriff of Walla Walla County Greeting

You are commanded to have the body of William McCow by you detained as it is said before Hon. S.C. Wingard Judge of the District Court of the 1st Judicial District of Washington Territory at his chamber in Walla Walla city on Thursday the 11th day of Feburary AD 1877 at the time of 10 o'clock am of that day to do and recieve what shall then and there be considered concerning the said William McCow and have you then and there this Writ.
Witness the Hon. S.C. Wingard Judge of the District Court of the 1st Judicial District of Washington Territory and the rule of said Courth this 31st day of January AD 1877.
